cp23:1.3: For protection against yakkhas who, according to Ja 510, are afraid of iron. As holdovers of the “old gods” they were threatened by the new technology of iron-smelting.
cp23:5.1: Commentary has asadisaṁ, āveṇikaṁ for uttariya. The expected sense “superior” doesn’t fit, unless it is sarcastic.
